item.description:
A $50 donation includes tea, sandwiches, dessert, a healing or reading session and good company at this beautiful place for the afternoon.

Limited to 100 attendees. Please makeÂ  your contribution by April 1st to be on the list!

Reserve your ticket by contacting afternoontea428@gmail.com

Services are donated. Your contribution goes to HAWC - Healing Abuse Working Change - a great way to support women.

http://www.hawcdv.org/

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: HAWC Afternoon Tea Fundraiser
